name: py-advancedhtmlparser
description:
Fast Indexed python HTML parser which builds a DOM node tree, providing
common getElementsBy* functions for scraping, testing, modification, and
formatting

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-queryablelist
dependencies.description:
Python module to add support for ORM-style filtering to any list of
items
